thread.title: Ruth Di Lorenzo Bushey
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Ruth Di Lorenzo Bushey

author: Ruth Di Lorenzo Bushey
title: Ruth Di Lorenzo Bushey
text: Happy to report that I had an excellent experience, once again, at Town Fair Tire, Westfield, MA. A nasty pot hole got my front right tire for the second time in 2 years. Thankfully, I had purchased the tire replacement insurance, and it was replaced without question. The fellows at the counter were fast, efficient and professional. I was back on the road in less than an hour having opted for an alignment as well. Thank you.
